long_description: The REI RFID Clip Stash Wallet deters theft of your funds and your identification by blocking access to financial and personal data stored inside bank cards that have RFID chips. Special barrier in the wallet blocks unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside credit and debit cards. Carabiner-style clip adds a layer of security: Attach it to a belt loop, then slip it in a pocket. Made of light yet durable ripstop nylon, the REI RFID Clip Stash Wallet can fit cards, cash and coins; a zip closure helps keep contents secure.
short_description: The REI RFID Clip Stash Wallet deters theft of your funds and your identification by blocking access to financial and personal data stored inside bank cards that have RFID chips.
